content.text: Before installing information technology cabling within closures containing power supply cabling the following  shall be ensured:
a) the compartment shall prevent inadvertent contact with the power supply cabling;
b) where a barrier is used between the mains power cabling and the information technology cabling (either  conducting or non-conducting) it shall meet a minimum of IP20 as specified in EN 60529;
c) metallic closures and conductive compartment barriers shall be earthed in accordance with 5.1.1.1.
